category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_retain_ACL_objects_on_release
preference.preference_description: Determines the state of Access Control List objects on a target when a release status is applied. Valid Values: true: Any pre-existing ACL objects will not be removed when the release status is applied. false:Any pre-existing ACL objects will be removed when the release status is applied. This is the default value.
